constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 122 (Tuesday, July 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACKSON:
H.R. 4419.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H3625]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To extend the pilot program on partnership agreements to construct new facilities for the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
